title: Textile, late 18th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: wefts tie-dyed before weaving (weft ikat)
dimensions:
a. Warp: 104.7 cm (41 1/8 in.) Weft: 45.7 cm (17 7/8 in.)
b. Warp: 121.3 cm (47 3/4 in.) Weft:  89.2 cm (35 1/4 in.) selvage to selvage
description: Narrow and wide bands of weft ikat in dark indigo and cream alternating with solid bands of medium-hue indigo.

Textile, late 18th century.
late 18th century. Medium: cotton
